A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

global_metalness_emissive_roughness_subs.title: Global Metalness Emissive Roughness Subsurface

global_metalness_emissive_roughness_subs.description: The default MERS value to use for particles when not defined via textureset
